[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Our Treatment

Ultrasound Cavitation

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Ultrasound Cavitation works to eliminate extra inches and achieve instant fat loss. Converts fat cells into liquids that are drained by the body’s own natural filtration system. Cavitation causes friction in between fat cells, which leads to cells emulsifying. It then eliminates through the urinary and lymphatic systems.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4206″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Ultrasound fat cavitation can be used on virtually any area of your body where you’re carrying extra weight. Common treatment spots include the belly, thighs, buttocks, or back. At Medarts Weight Loss Specialists, we can also tackle smaller areas, like your chin or upper arm.

Unlike liposuction, ultrasound fat cavitation doesn’t require any surgical procedures – so there’s no anesthesia, no blood, and no bandages. Instead, the treatment relies on high-frequency sound waves to help you lose inches, without causing any bodily trauma.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588709087776{padding-top: 107px !important;padding-bottom: 94px !important;}” parallax_background_image=”4151″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″][vc_row_inner content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Reshape Your Body

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”][vc_column_text]

Body Sculpting Treatments Customized Personally For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
